replies.body: It sounds from your description that your other account was hacked, in which case it's best to talk with those account agents in your [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to secure it. Look over those questions again and do your best to answer them. Once you can verify yourself as the account creator you'll have control again in no time.
